parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of the web page used as heading.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.description: Refresh interval of the generated web page. The interval should be similar to the interval for starting slmon. If empty, the web page must be refreshed manually.

parameter.name: address
parameter.description: Host of the Seedlink server to connect to. If the acquisition is running on one system nothing needs to be changed.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port of the Seedlink server to connect to. If the acquisition is running on one system this port must match the configured local Seedlink port.

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: e-mail address added to web pages.

parameter.name: wwwdir
parameter.description: Output directory of the web pages.

parameter.name: icon
parameter.description: Favicon URL of the web pages. Not mandatory.

parameter.name: linkname
parameter.description: Name of Link shown in footer of web pages.

parameter.name: linkurl
parameter.description: URL referred to by linkname in footer of web pages.

parameter.name: liveurl
parameter.description: URL to live seismograms. %s will be replaced by station name. Not mandatory.

parameter.name: group
parameter.description: Defines the group of the station that is monitored.
